task_summary: Robot opens the oven door by detecting, approaching, grasping, and actuating the door in a kitchen-like environment. Each phase corresponds to a contact-sheet frame.

task_long_description.overview: This episode involves a robot arm in a kitchen scene performing the task of opening the oven door. The robot first detects the oven door, approaches above it, calculates a side grasp pose, executes the grasp, verifies the hold, then actuates the opening using the 'OpenContainer' primitive. After opening, the robot retreats. Constraints include physical access to the door handle, robust perception, and stable grasping.
preconditions: Oven door is closed and accessible
stepwise_plan: Check visibility of oven door; retry detection if needed
Move to a position above the oven door
failure_and_recovery: Failure: oven door not detected—retry scan
Failure: grasp unstable—recompute pose & retry grasp
Failure: actuation blocked—manual intervention or abort
task_long_description.termination: Task ends when oven door is open and robot arm has retreated

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if oven door is visible in the workspace
Scans/raster search for oven door if not found
Precision object detection for oven door
Moves arm to a position above the oven door
Computes side grasp pose for oven door handle
Opens the oven door using actuation primitive
Retreats arm away from oven door after opening

recovery_strategy: Retry grasp pose computation and GraspAtPose if grasp unstable
Abort and alert if OpenContainer repeatedly fails
assumptions: Frames show robot interacting with oven door—no visible obstacles blocking approach; oven door assumed to be closed in frame_0, gradually opened by frame_7. Scene confirms physical oven door presence matches instruction.
No explicit force or timeout specified; library ports set to default bins.
Instruction doesn't specify handle type, but frames suggest side grasp; resolved accordingly.

expected_success_criteria: Robot opens oven door without collision or loss of grip
Door state clearly visible in final frames
